name: tempCube-RemoteTemperatureMonitoring
0:
”Alexa, ask temp cube monitor what is my cubes temperature”
”Alexa, ask temp cube monitor what is my cubes humidity”
”Alexa, ask temp cube monitor what is my temperature”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: temp cube monitor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
tempCube, Wi-Fi enabled smart temperature and humidity sensor alerts via email and SMS when temperature or humidity goes low or high. It comes with a USB-powered rechargeable battery with four days back-up that offers you complete peace of mind. 
To know the temperature status from Alexa, Say, "Alexa, what's the cube's temperature."
Note: To use, this skill user should have an account with tempCube and tempCube devices.
